sentences.sContent: Mr Molto has agreed to testify at the trial.
sentences.sCn: 莫尔托先生已经同意出庭作证。

sentences.sContent: Can you testify that you saw the defendant at the scene of the crime?
sentences.sCn: 你能作证你看到被告在犯罪现场吗？

sentences.sContent: The empty shops in the high street testify to the depth of the recession.
sentences.sCn: 大街上空无一人的商店说明了经济萧条的严重程度。

exam.question: He is the only person who can ______ in this case, because the other witnesses were killed mysteriously.

answer.explain: 句意： 他是仅有的一个能为此案作证的人， 因为其他证人都被神秘地谋杀了。charge： 控诉； accuse： 指控； rectify： 调整。

remMethod.val: test(证据) ＋ ify → 用证据来证明 → 证明

trans.tranOther: to make a formal statement of what is true, especially in a court of law
